content.question: Using the graph provided of the long-run Phillips curve (LRPC), which of the following could cause the change from <math alttext="L R P C sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>LRPC</mtext><mn>1</mn></msub></math> to <math alttext="L R P C sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>LRPC</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: An increase in the price of natural resources
An increase in the central bankâ€™s administered interest rates
A decrease in unemployment insurance benefits

content.answer: A decrease in unemployment insurance benefits

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
